title: Enable Sourcegraph
body:
I want to use [Sourcegraph code search and code review](https://sourcegraph.com) with go. A project maintainer needs to enable it to set up a webhook so the code is up-to-date there.

Could you please enable go on @Sourcegraph by going to https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/golang/go and clicking on Settings? (It should only take 15 seconds.)

Thank you!
